function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of COVID-19 infections","Impact":"Increase in peak infections, overwhelming healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Prioritize distribution of self-protection resources to high-risk populations and frontline workers","Technologies":"Resource allocation optimization, logistic management systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of self-protection measures under strict quarantine measures","Impact":"Inability to implement self-protection measures effectively, leading to increased risk of infection for high-risk populations","Mitigation":"Concentrated distribution of resources (e.g., face masks, medical clothes, hand sanitizer, and disinfectant) to high-risk populations who need to go out or come into contact with infected patients","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, supply chain tracking technology","People":"High-risk populations, frontline workers, essential workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","Impact":"Resource scarcity, inability to meet demand for self-protection resources, increased risk of infection for general population","Mitigation":"Strategic planning for resource allocation, development of alternative self-protection measures, mass production of essential resources","Technologies":"Resource management systems, production automation technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
